    Listen to audio summaries in Google Docs

    Google Workspace is introducing a new feature in Google Docs, allowing users to listen to AI-generated audio summaries of their documents. Powered by Gemini, this innovation aims to boost productivity and accessibility by enabling quick comprehension of lengthy texts, whether users are multitasking or prefer auditory learning. The feature is designed to enhance how users interact with document content, rolling out initially to select Workspace editions.
